subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: On a night of hard fouls, plenty of banging and staredowns, the Atlanta Hawks beat the Miami Heat 106-91 to take a 3-2 lead in their Eastern Conference first-round series.
snippet: On a night of hard fouls, plenty of banging and staredowns, the Atlanta Hawks beat the Miami Heat 106-91 to take a 3-2 lead in their Eastern Conference first-round series.
